Nivo Slider

Add a Nivo Slider to your awesome jekyll site

Are you a beet?

Titanium white, Thalo green, Prussian blue, Van Dyke brown, Alizarin crimson, Sap green, Cad yellow, and Permanent red.

Red hot Chili Peppers

This is your world, whatever makes you happy you can put in it.

Prussian blue

You can create the world you want to see and be a part of

images

<div id="slider" class="nivoSlider">
                            <img src="/media/slide1.jpg" title="#htmlcaption1" />
                            <img src="/media/slide2.jpg" title="#htmlcaption2" />
                            <img src="/media/slide3.jpg" title="#htmlcaption3" />
                        </div>

Captions

<div id="htmlcaption1" class="nivo-html-caption">
                            <h2>Are you a beet?</h2>
                            <p>Titanium white, Thalo green, Prussian blue, Van Dyke brown, Alizarin crimson, Sap green, Cad yellow, and Permanent red.</p>
                        </div>
                        <div id="htmlcaption2" class="nivo-html-caption">
                            <h2 class="bg-wine-grape">Red hot Chili Peppers</h2>
                            <p>This is your world, whatever makes you happy you can put in it.</p>
                        </div>
                        <div id="htmlcaption3" class="nivo-html-caption">
                            <h2 class="bg-sunny-grass">Prussian blue</h2>
                            <p>
                                You can create the world you want to see and be a part of
                            </p>
                        </div>

Background Video

Add a video background to your awesome jekyll site

Whose world will you change?

A gift to UC Davis can make a world of difference.

Video Code

<div class="video_wrapper">
                        <div class="video">
                            <video height="400" muted="true" autoplay="true" loop="true" poster="#">
                                <source src="#" type="video/webm">
                                <source src="#" type="video/mp4">
                            </video>
                        </div>
                        <div class="video_words">
                            <h1>Whose world will you&nbsp;change?</h1>
                            <h3>A gift to UC Davis can make a world of&nbsp;difference.</h3>
                        </div>
                    </div>
